Description: Fragment of belly of black figure Clazomenian painted pottery broad amphora. Cloaked woman. Purple for skirt and for stripe on dark paint below panel. White for flesh and for three rows of dots on hem.
Curator's comments: To judge by the thickness of the wall this may be from the same pot as Pl. GB 590, 9 (BM GR 1888.0208.73.c). BSA xlvii, 131-C II. 10.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 590, 16)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 157)
